剋字的基本解释

克
（④剋）
kè
能够：克勤克俭。
战胜，攻下：攻克。克复（战胜敌人并收回失地）。
制伏：克服。克制。克己奉公。以柔克刚。
严格限定：克日。克期。克扣。
消化：克食。
公制重量单位或质量单位：一克等于一公斤的千分之一。
中国西藏地方的容量单位，一克青稞约二十五市斤；亦是其地积单位，播种一克种子的土地称为一克地，约合一市亩。

剋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kè］
［《廣韻》苦得切，入德，溪。］
亦作“尅1”。
(1)战胜；制服。
(2)约束；克制。
(3)严格限定。多用于时日。
(4)能。
(5)成。
(6)克扣；暗中削减。
(7)砍削，截断。
(8)通“刻”。刻镂。
(9)通“刻”。刻薄。
[②]［kēi］
(1)训斥；狠狠批评。
(2)方言。抠取。

剋字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剋； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页140第13
【唐韻】苦得切【集韻】乞得切，?音刻。【爾雅·釋詁】剋，勝也。【疏】謂得勝也。【後漢·桓譚傳】何征不剋。又【廣韻】剋，已也。又必也，急也。又剋期，約定日期也。【後漢·鍾離意傳】解徒桎梏，與剋期，俱至。又《讀書通》刻通作剋。【吳志·賀齊傳】謹以剋心，非但書紳。又【集韻】剋，殺也。

剋字的源字形

暂无。

Gram
Basic explanation of words
Gram
(④g)
kè
Ability: diligent and thrifty.
Conquer, conquer: conquer. Recover (to defeat the enemy and recover the lost ground).
Overcome: overcome. restraint. Self-denial and public service. Overcome strength with softness.
Strictly limited: Kri. G period. Deduction.
Digestion: stamina.
Metric unit of weight or mass: one gram is equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
The capacity unit in Tibet, China, is about 25 kilograms per gram of highland barley; it is also its plot unit. The land on which one gram of seeds is sown is called one gram of land, which is about one mu.
Gram
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kè］
["Guangyun" is so bitter, enters Germany, stream. ]
Also known as "gram 1".
(1) Victory; uniform.
(2) Restraint; restraint.
(3) Strictly limited. Mostly used for time.
(4) Yes.
(5) Cheng.
(6) Deduction; Secretly reduced.
(7) Cut, cut off.
(8) Through "carving". Engraved.
(9) Through "carving". mean.
[②]［kēi］
(1) Reprimand; severe criticism.
(2) Dialects. Pull out.
Gram
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　克; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 140 13
[Tang Yun] Too hard to cut [Ji Yun] To beg to cut,? Sound cutting. 【Erya · Shi Gu】g, wins. 【Sparse】It means victory. [The Legend of the Later Han Huan Tan] He Zhengbuke. [Guang Yun] grams, it is also. It must also be urgent. It was over again, and a date was agreed upon. [Later Han·Zhong Liyi Biography] The solution to the fetters of the tutor, and the period of extermination, are all there to be. Also "Reading Master" engraved and conquered. [Wu Zhi·He Qi Chuan] To restrain the heart, not only the gentry. Also 【Jiyun】g, kill.
